abstract.t: The IDNA is a key issue for the IUCG as a paradigm for the future ofthe Internet. There is therefore a need to make sure its descriptiondocument set reflects a complete IETF and users consensus. To helpthis, this memo keeps track of the WG-IDNABIS/LC requested andreceived answers. The IAB Draft on IDN has been added because someremarks have been made which are important. The author is quoted ifthe comment is not from IUCG
